title: Veal with buccaneer's sauce
description: Veal chops are wonderfully accompanied by Michel Roux's flavourful buccaneer sauce in this dish.
ingredients: 60g/2½oz shallots or small onions, peeled, thinly sliced
40g/1½oz fresh root ginger, peeled, finely grated
110g/4oz fully ripe bananas, peeled, sliced into rounds
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 thin veal chops, preferable rosé veal
salt and freshly ground black pepper
150g/5oz baby sweetcorn, cut in half lengthways
